text: The India Meteorological Department (IMD), also referred to as the Met Office, is a weather forecasting organization run by the Government of India, it also tracks and forecast tropical cyclones, similar to the National Hurricane Center. The headquarters in New Delhi, India. ==Sources== ==Other websites== *IMD website Category:Government of India Category:New Delhi Category:1875 establishments in Asia Category:1870s establishments in India
title: India Meteorological Department
